Skill.name: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill that service resources have. For technician type service resources, the skill represents their area of expertise. For asset type service resources, the skill must be specified as Test Drive.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.
